name: Plunge [OST Jam]
description:
Plunge into opponents with your spear to protect your home island.

This was submitted for the OST Jam Vol 6.

==== STILL A WORK IN PROGRESS ====

  • Only two of the five levels are available right away, more to come!
  • Need to add SFX
  • Add a victory and defeat splash image
  • Extra animations between attacks and victory so things
  • MORE JUICE

==== SONGS USED ====

lashman - Spooky Adventure

ModalModule - Dyna Dude - Spector Man's Stage

==== KEYBOARD CONTROLS ====

WASD or Arrow keys to move left or right

Space to PLUNGE!

==== CONTROLLER ====

Left analog or D-Pad to move left or right

East or South face buttons to PLUNGE!
